name: Skeleton Keys
description:
Mr. Bones is the haunted house keykeeper. On Halloween night, four mischievous ghosts decide to treat Mr. Bones with a trick and steal each key. He must now locate all three keys.

As Mr. Bones, the player will run to collect the keys. The player must collect all three to win the game. The player will lose one life if they run into a purple ghost and two lives if they run into a red ghost. There will be three lives available when the game begins.

Use the arrow keys to move Mr. Bones!
